The cloth is okay, but the stitches started coming off after the second wash. The entire stitched thread came off at places around the waist and now the elastic is exposed. Very poor quality stitching.

These are very comfortable to wear. Once you start wearing these pyjamas you will hesitate to wear shorts or trackpant.Size is somewhat bit large. Probably i should have ordered small size rather than medium. So for example if Size 31 fits perfectly choose small size (28-30). I have brought another one small size which just fits perfectly.Thank you Amazon.
If you put this into the washing machine, your wife will kill you. The colour bleeds like crazy. Amazon brand Symbol needs to do something about this.
Very poor quality......got damaged product....fed up with your product quality....regretful..

recommending that choose the larger size as anyone wear whatever sized, pyjama are cotton fabric and they are pretty lower type as i compare to the regular pyjama(jockey), wear it after 1 wash because colour fragmentation or fading

Product is alright with respect to fabric and comfort. But it is torn as shown on photo and both pockets are of different sizes. One is small and other is big. I did not expect it with Amazon most trusted and biggest retailer Clouldtail, a bit disappointed. Anyways, keeping it considering the current situation otherwise...

I ordered this because it is an Amazon brand and looked quite economical. But then, when the price is 'cheap', there is a "price" to pay! The cloth quality is quite average (ie, rough cloth for a loungewear), and thus not very comfortable to wear compared to other well known brands. Also, whatever starch or chemical they have used to process the fabric is quite annoyingly smelly. You will have to wash it a few times to get rid of that smell. Size (the length) is short - when you compare with other good brands. So ordering the next or even next-to-next size may be required. Overall, not a good product. Buy it, if your main consideration is just the price and you are willing to put up with all the discomfort!

I love these pyjamas! They're soft, comfortable, fit very well, and have excellent quality overall (stitching and material). They look very good too. The fit is just right, relaxed - not to loose and not too tight and super comfortable. In case it matters to you, they have a 2-buttons fly opening.After trying one, I immediately ordered 3 more of these in other colours. I usually use Jockey pyjamas but trust me, these are almost equally good, if not better. The difference in the cost seals the deal (I got these for Rs. 400/- each during the Great Indian Festival Sale while the Jockeys cost a minimum of double this price).I recommend these 100%. Fyi- my experience with the Amazon brands like Symbol and Solimo has always been excellent.

I have bought this same Symbol Lounge bottoms 4 times. The first time it was 5 stars. White color, now unavailable. 2nd time I bought it on sale reddish color, it was ok, 3 stars. 3rd batch 2 sets of navy blue - ok, but I think the dark dye did not suit my skin and I found it itchy. This is the fourth time - ok again, but looks like the vendor used some tricks to reduce the cloth, so while it fits, it seems smaller. PLEASE Amazon, INCREASE THE PRICE OF YOUR Symbol Brand LOUNGE BOTTOM IN LINE WITH TODAY'S PRICES AND PROVIDE US WITH 2015 QUALITY AND PLEASE SELL **WHITE** VARIANT AGAIN! This would be better than keeping the price low and reducing quality.

After a long time I have found a lounge wear which is perfect in terms of looks, fit, and comfort!! I have read lot if reviews here before ordering for the first time but after wearing it...most of the reviews I had read is all waste bcoz it is actually very good. Fabric is also not loosing color after multi wash! I initially ordered 1 and fater wearing it, I ended up ordering 4 more. I definitely recommend this product as lounge wear!

Fast color, good material, wash and wear, blended cotton, great stitching and very good fitting. In fact fitting depends upon one's body. I am a fit person with a normal waistline. I have already bought a similar quality with similar material similar sized pyjama from a well know brand in India for more than double the same price. Go for this Amazon's amazing product. Great value for money.

Now I really believe in Jockey or nothing. At the original price 999 this is worst, but at 50% less still it is not worth, my advice is please please do not buy. If you are a jockey man, hell noooooo.Fit, quality of fabric are zero. But elastic is good.

For taller men Medium & even long size will be little short, exactly as shown in the picture with ankle showing. Medium size I got was 28" waist & length 38". I tried L but the length is the same. Material seems mixed cotton & is light weight pants. You could find better home wear elsewhere.

It is really comfortable and fitting was also good for me but it is little bit different from the photo.The product is regular fit not slim fit as shown in photo . Good for wearing it at home but don’t consider it as formal wear as shown in photo . It is good for certain situation only if you are planning to wear it outdoors.

I've been wearing "Symbol" apparels for one year now. Very good thing is they've never disappointed me in terms of quality, price. Seems like a big brand is in building.This Pajama hasn't disappointed me either. Its light on skin, pretty comfortable and looks cool.Bring it on "Symbol". Looking forward for more such products under leisure model. Thanks.

The PJ is good as per my expectation. A good buy for 500.During WFH, it's comfortable to wear and work.Have washed it as well. Enjoying the PJs

I bought these and a “big US brand” pair pretty much wiring a week of each other. The Amazon pair is 80% of the other pair at perhaps half the cost. The big brand PJs didn’t shrink and are softer. But this is a decent pair. So I’m happy. But!!!  Are they made in India?  Would be a shame if they weren’t.

Fiting, design patern and comfert is good. However fabric is of very poor quality not heavy duty.It just torn apart within month waste of money. :( Don't buy.Company needs improve on fabric quality and it will be best seller.

These are excellent. Stitching is much better than many branded ones which cost 2-3 times more. There are only two minor things that you should consider -1. Fitting is on the slimmer side. If slim fit clothes typically don't fit you, you can order a larger size and spend 50 rupees to some local cloth alteration shop if its too loose.2. Length is slightly more than required. You might need to get it altered at a local shop.But at the price that they are available, they are a value for money as compared to expensive brands.

I always order just 1 piece of these Amazon Co-Branded Items to check the fabric material. This one is good.. in the past I had bad experience with one fo the Amazon-CoBranded Product (pajama) Buy without a 2nd choice.

Length can be a problem for taller men if they want to take it. My waist is 37" and lenght required for me is 43". Its length is 41"at time of purchase in unwashed new condition. It will surely shrink by 1.5" more.other wise it's a ok product quality wise.price also is somewhat more for this small  length. If they can make it 43" then it would be good. Also button for front is not comfortable for opening it.

Excellent fabric and stitching. The piece I got was manufactured in Bangladesh. I am 5'8" and the length was just below ankle. Very nice color and finish is superb. However, in spite of being labeled slim fit, the pant is very tight from the thighs downwards. It is more skinny than slim. I returned the item only for this reason.

First thing you notice in Jeans is they are way off with the length. you could expect at least 2" less in length.  These means either for short person or you are okay to wear it above ankle. Are they worth the price? They may be worth for price listed, but not for MRP mentioned. These jeans are thin, in fact almost similar thickness as formals. Could you use it for rough usage like Jean? No, you can’t. The zipper is cheaper quality so you may have to careful with that while putting a pressure, they may come off. Apart from that, they look like how it is shown in photo (color, stitch, and style). Fit and finish is up to the mark. Unless you are Brand junkie these are not bad jeans at this price.

I bought this by ignoring for the umpteenth time the wise adage, that you get what you pay for. In the pictures it looks mildly reminiscent of the Adidas Superstar. At about a ninth of its cost, and a high average rating, you'd believe this is worth it. Well it's not. I ordered a size 10 (UK), and my toes had some headroom to spare. But what's worse, the synthetic fabric of the shoe warps out of shape as you tie the laces. The edge of the 'tongue' or the inner flap presses against the front of your ankle. There is very little support for the arch of the foot. It was unpleasant, and I decided to return it. Your mileage might very, but I'd rather buy the Adidas Superstar if it's ever on sale or if I feel like splurging five grand. Not this one.

Sparx is a well known brand and is quite reliable if you ask me. I've used Sparx products in the past and was never disappointed with the quality. First of all the price is very reasonable, you won't find anything better in this price range. Secondly, its totally value for money & is a very high quality product. The shoes are light in weight, fits perfectly & provides comfort to the feet. They are good for outdoor activities and you can also wear them casually, they do enhance the overall look of your outfit. The shoes seem strong & durable, if you are going white ones then you'll have to take some extra care to make sure they remain white & shining at all times. I'm happy with my purchase & will definitely recommend it.I bought White in size 10.

Really nice quality product.Not giving full 5 stars as the shoes is larger then expected. My size is UK 9, shoe size is UK 9. Still the shoe is larger and this not so comfortable to wear.Please buy one size smaller, the shoes is nice just need to take care of size.

The shoes are a counterfeit and not genuine sparx product.The tongue of the shoe does not bare a sparx logo and the other logos on the shoe get wiped off too.Also there are irregularities in the stitching of the shoe at the front portion.A genuine product is expected when you pay for it.Please check if the product is genuine before buying it.

Very good and elegant looking sneakers, really has a cool street vibe about it. Fits well, and the sole is really comfortable. It may feel a bit heavy on your toes at first, but overall really impressed with the product. Goes well with casual as well as sports wear.This is what I call value for money. Sparx is a really good brand, and I'm surprised how they're not more of a common household name. Do yourself a favour and save your money by going for this instead of that Nike sneaker you're thinking of buying.

Product is very good. Buy a size next to yours.In the size chart given on the buying options, they given as 27cm for 7uk size, I measured my foot size and it is 27cm so I ordered 7uk but in the delivered box the size 7uk mentioned as 25cm there is a difference in the measurement given in the Amazon's chart size and original delivery size. Hence it is better to order the next size to yours.Also why it is better to buy the next size is, the front part is little smaller in the show it may give discomforts.So if your size is 7 then order 8 it will be better.

Review after a week of usage:I was initially hesitant to buy running shoes from here, but due to budget constraints here we are. The look is really good for this price and it is pretty comfortable to workout in. I found the fit a bit too tight at the beginning but after a running session it was alright. You'd be surprised by how good they are! Bought it for 599, totally worth it.

Firstly, shoes lasted only 3 months upon daily usage.Secondly, the orange top layer of insole is of Satin/Polyester due to which foot slips inside the shoe resulting in poor gripping of shoe in the foot.

I WAS REALLY SCEPTICAL ABOUT THIS BUDGET SHOE BECAUSE OF MY BAD EXPERIENCE WITH ANOTHER BUDGET SHOE (ASIAN WNDR 13, THE BEST SELLER BUDGET SHOE, THAT WAS COMPLETELY CRAP). I ONLY WANTED TO STICK TO GOOD BRANDS LIKE PUMA, LOTTO, OR AT LEAST SPARX. BUT THIS SHOE CAUGHT MY EYES AND WANTED TO TRY MY LUCK AND ORDERED IT FOR 549. I MUST SAY THAT IT EXACTLY IS AS SHOWN IN PICTURE, AND IS AWESOME COMPARED TO THE PRICE. THE SOLE IS OKAY, and THE SOFT MEMORY FOAM INSIDE IS A BIT TOO SOFT, SO OVERALL COMFORTABLE. My size IS 9, BUT IT'S LIKE 9.4 OR SOMETHING..NOT TIGHT, BUT WITH SOCKS, IT WILL BE PERFECT FITTING. I WAS REALLY DOUBTFUL, BUT NOW I CAN BLINDLY RECOMMEND THIS SHOE FOR ANYONE WHO IS LOOKING FOR A SHOE BELOW 600.. KUDOS TO THE BRAND. AND AMAZON DELIVERED IT IN LESS THAN 2 DAYS..

After using it for 2 months, I am writing this review. I use this only for my morning walk - it is light weight and much comfortable. But the problem is cloth lining is torn off and forcing me to buy another shoe.

Pros: light weight, comfortable, good fitting, can be used for walking on smooth tracks/raod.Cons:1.  I have replaced it for its faulty lace eyelets. It's eyelets are not crafted fine as other brands due to which fiber from lace stuck into it. Same issue is also found in replaced shoes but it's slightly less.2.  2nd issue is it's tongue. Foam fitting inside tongue of one shoe is not good. It seems that more foam is stuffed inside it, beyond it's normal capacity.3.  I think it's sole is too soft to run, walk on rough ground, road or track. It's sole would easily scrubbed/wear out on rough surface while running or jogging.

Amazing deal. The product is very robust and build quality is amazing. Got it for 529 on a sale. Worth the money. Inner soul is Very soft and it won't come off easily as it seems to be stiched hit hot attached. It's also very light weight. Amazing deal must buy.The product fit is also good.

If slight improvements are made by the manufacturer, these shoes are Comparable with Skechers make being sold in the range of ₹5000/-. It is recommended being the best walking shoes at this affordable price.Now after almost five months of regular use, I am adding this experience. Shoes are very comfortable and helped in making walking as a habit. The quality of inner lining cloth should have been better as it has started wearing it out. If this lining quality is improved, then you don't need Skechers shoes.

Awesome shoe - Reducing my rating to 3 start after 4 months of usageSuperb shoes for walking and running in this price range. I got them for 600 INR and considering this price, believe me it can't be any better than these.Main thing that I liked is they are very light weight. You don't even that you are wearing shoes :)After using it for 3 days, I ordered another pair of shoes for my dad and he is also completely satisfied.If you are looking for a shoes which are light weight and comfortable, just go for it !!!******* Review updated after 4 months of usage ******I have reduced my rating to this product to 3 star after using them for 4 months.I used these shoes for almost 4 months. Right after using them for around 2 and half months the sole underneath started getting worn out and  pretty clearly see hole (not see through) getting formed under the thumb area and I felt lot of difficulties while wearing these shoes when I go for a walk as small stones use to gather in that area (not from the bottom) and I was unable to walk. Every time I need to take out the shoes and clear the stones.So overall if you want to use this this product for daily walk, you hardly might be able to use them for 4 months.Anyways if you are a serious walker you need to buy another pair of shoes after 4 months as you can't use them for a longer period, so think twice before buying them.But if you are using them only for office or daily usage (no much walking) then you can buy these shoes.Latest update -It started giving heel pain too, as well started getting holes at the bottomFinal Verdict -Use these shoes only if you want them for regular use but for sure not for walking or jogging !!!HAPPY BUYING !!!
Good product in this price range, light in weight, cushioning of the shoe is fabulous.

First of all, I would like to make it clear that what I have outlined in the following review is my personal experience.1. At first I liked about the shoes that company does not cheat on this pair. You get the same shoes in the box as shown in the photos.2. The shoes are very comfortable and Light weight, as the co., says in the description.3. The quality of the shoes is also very good at this price.4. You will find the right size of shoes for your feet, Which is really good.5. The packaging of the shoes also good.6. I am writing this review after using these shoes for around 5.5 months. When I bought it , it felt good on feet and shoes was comfortable to wear nd light weight. Inner cushion felt good but sometimes felt wobbly while walking. But no complaint there. But after using them for walking for about 4 km a day (mostly on nature trails on hills near my house), its sole got almost flat... then I checked and found that its sole is made up of ethylene vinyl acetate which  seems to have very less abrasion resistant. Now when it rains, I feel of slipping on very small layer of mud on road as shoes has almost lost its grip on the ground below. So please think about it before buying this shoe.

The poor quality of adhesive is completely gone and the sole is already coming apart from the shoe.Humble opinion is never buy this shoe. Not because what happened to me. But the product is honestly very cheap and you could instead spend 50-100₹ more and get some excellent product. And I sincerely think this is not the product for Amazon recommended page. They don't even give warranties on these products because it would be insane to do so many replacement.

Asian Creta 12 shoes come with comfortable outside material and an inner Memory Foam.Shoes are designed in the budget segment and can be used for walking. Looks good but while testing it in the outdoor conditions I found that it's not that much comfort from the corners. Sole comfort is not good and direct contact with the surface can be felt.A sock-like structure and good design make it a good deal but however comfort can't be compromised.

Few days ago I ordered this product, product delivered in the right time.Then I unbox it, the box was damaged, looks like someone take from scrape..Its ok,Then come to the product, and the product also damaged, leff shoe steeching is not proper..I love this shoes comfort, its very good.. And stylish, and looks very pretty.But this shoes upper side made from yarn/fabric, you cant wash confidently, but if you take white color you have to wash,Otherwise you cant ware publicly,As I feel in my hand - if you use daily it lasts maybe 6 to 8 months...Its my feeling, not mandatory for all....Thank you..
Reality is completely different, product is not upto the mark and expectations, its not comfortable to wear.

Great shoes at an affordable price.Qualities of the shoes-1.Great comfort with double layered grip(5/5).2.Very lightweight(5/5).3.Little high price but affordable(3.5/5).4.Very durable and strong material is used(5/5).5.The breathable mesh material is great(5/5).6.Best for running,walking,casual wear,sports,etc.(4.5/5).7.Laces are of right size so no worry of repeatedly tying(5/5).8.Nice non slippery sole(5/5).

The size is same but the inner neck has a cloth that is fixed( seems as if a socks inside) which causes Stiffness. The actual purpose of the lace would be useless as the neck is not expandable. Otherwise product is very good and worth the money. Just go one/ two size more.

It would have been better for the price & advertisement. It's a canvas type shoe & not useful for running as mentioned. The inner layer & company name tag at ankle portion (see the image),always intervene while wearing shoes, really it disturbs.No proper packing, just I received the bare shoe box closed all sides with tape. Overall shoes are good only for normal walk. Better to try other shoe brands.

Bought this product in Great Indian Sale @₹850/-. They are selling minor defective / rejected pieces. Ordered Size L initially which was tight for me, so exchanged for XL but it was lose. In L size piece the zipper was getting stuck near the bottom and In size XL there is a visible defect in the inside of the product (see attached pics). There were arrow stickers marked on the defect line in the clothing (which in clothing quality terms mean here is the defect). It is probably a quality rejected piece, so going out in sale at lower prices. Seller should be honest atleast in tagging this as refurbished piece.
